mapper.select: SELECT g.bet_id, g.bureau_num, g.user_name, g.game_name, g.set_time, g.bet_amount, g.winning_amount, g.validbet, g.win_Loss, g.min_limit_red, g.max_limit_red FROM game_record g
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(g.bet_amount) ,0) as betAmount, IFNULL( SUM(g.validbet),0) as validbet, IFNULL(SUM(g.win_Loss),0) as winLoss, IFNULL(SUM(g.winning_amount),0) as winningAmount FROM game_record g

select count(1) as num,IFNULL(sum(a.betamount),0) as amount from (select SUM(g.bet_amount) betamount from game_record g
GROUP BY g.user_id) a
select IFNULL(SUM(g.validbet),0) as validbet,IFNULL(SUM(g.win_Loss),0) as profitAndLoss from game_record g
